text: The Magnificent Dope is a 1942 American comedy movie directed by Walter Lang and starring Don Ameche, Henry Fonda, Lynn Bari, Edward Everett Horton, Frank Orth, Hobart Cavanaugh. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Magnificent Dope
